title: trinity
body:
**I try to install trinity by spack but face the error**
```

$ spack install trinity %gcc@5.4.0
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    r@3.6.0%gcc@5.4.0~X~external-lapack~memory_profiling~rmath arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@5.4.0+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^cairo@1.16.0%gcc@5.4.0~X+pdf arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^fontconfig@2.12.3%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^font-util@1.3.1%gcc@5.4.0 fonts=encodings,font-adobe-100dpi,font-adobe-75dpi,font-adobe-utopia-100dpi,font-adobe-utopia-75dpi,font-adobe-utopia-type1,font-alias,font-arabic-misc,font-bh-100dpi,font-bh-75dpi,font-bh-lucidatypewriter-100dpi,font-bh-lucidatypewriter-75dpi,font-bh-ttf,font-bh-type1,font-bitstream-100dpi,font-bitstream-75dpi,font-bitstream-speedo,font-bitstream-type1,font-cronyx-cyrillic,font-cursor-misc,font-daewoo-misc,font-dec-misc,font-ibm-type1,font-isas-misc,font-jis-misc,font-micro-misc,font-misc-cyrillic,font-misc-ethiopic,font-misc-meltho,font-misc-misc,font-mutt-misc,font-schumacher-misc,font-screen-cyrillic,font-sun-misc,font-winitzki-cyrillic,font-xfree86-type1 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@5.4.0+sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^libsigsegv
                        ^perl@5.26.2%gcc@5.4.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                ^readline@7.0%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                    ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@5.4.0~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                        ^pkgconf@1.6.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^automake@1.16.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^bdftopcf@1.0.5%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^fontsproto@2.1.3%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^util-macros@1.19.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^libxfont@1.5.2%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^freetype@2.9.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                ^libpng@1.6.34%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                    ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@5.4.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^libfontenc@1.1.3%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                ^xproto@7.0.31%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^xtrans@1.3.5%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^mkfontdir@1.0.7%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^mkfontscale@1.1.2%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^gperf
                ^libxml2@2.9.9%gcc@5.4.0~python arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^libiconv@1.15%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^glib@2.56.3%gcc@5.4.0~libmount tracing=none arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^gettext@0.19.8.1%gcc@5.4.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^tar
                ^libffi@3.2.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^pcre@8.42%gcc@5.4.0~jit+multibyte+utf arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^python@2.7.16%gcc@5.4.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter+ucs4~uuid+zlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^expat
                    ^openssl@1.1.1b%gcc@5.4.0+systemcerts arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^sqlite@3.0.8:
            ^pixman@0.38.0%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^curl@7.63.0%gcc@5.4.0~darwinssl~gssapi~libssh~libssh2~nghttp2 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^icu4c@60.1%gcc@5.4.0 cxxstd=11 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^libjpeg-turbo@2.0.2%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^cmake@3.15.1%gcc@5.4.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^nasm
        ^libtiff@4.0.10%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^openjdk@11.0.2%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^pango@1.41.0%gcc@5.4.0~X arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^gobject-introspection@1.56.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^bison@3.0.5%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^help2man@1.47.8%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^flex@2.6.4%gcc@5.4.0+lex arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^harfbuzz@2.3.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^tcl@8.6.8%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    r-edger@3.22.3%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^r-locfit@1.5-9.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^r@3.6.0%gcc@5.4.0~X~external-lapack~memory_profiling~rmath arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@5.4.0+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^cairo@1.16.0%gcc@5.4.0~X+pdf arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^fontconfig@2.12.3%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^font-util@1.3.1%gcc@5.4.0 fonts=encodings,font-adobe-100dpi,font-adobe-75dpi,font-adobe-utopia-100dpi,font-adobe-utopia-75dpi,font-adobe-utopia-type1,font-alias,font-arabic-misc,font-bh-100dpi,font-bh-75dpi,font-bh-lucidatypewriter-100dpi,font-bh-lucidatypewriter-75dpi,font-bh-ttf,font-bh-type1,font-bitstream-100dpi,font-bitstream-75dpi,font-bitstream-speedo,font-bitstream-type1,font-cronyx-cyrillic,font-cursor-misc,font-daewoo-misc,font-dec-misc,font-ibm-type1,font-isas-misc,font-jis-misc,font-micro-misc,font-misc-cyrillic,font-misc-ethiopic,font-misc-meltho,font-misc-misc,font-mutt-misc,font-schumacher-misc,font-screen-cyrillic,font-sun-misc,font-winitzki-cyrillic,font-xfree86-type1 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@5.4.0+sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                    ^libsigsegv
                                ^perl@5.26.2%gcc@5.4.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                    ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                        ^readline@7.0%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                            ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@5.4.0~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                                ^pkgconf@1.6.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^automake@1.16.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^bdftopcf@1.0.5%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                ^fontsproto@2.1.3%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                    ^util-macros@1.19.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                ^libxfont@1.5.2%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                    ^freetype@2.9.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                        ^libpng@1.6.34%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                            ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@5.4.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                    ^libfontenc@1.1.3%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                        ^xproto@7.0.31%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                    ^xtrans@1.3.5%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^mkfontdir@1.0.7%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                ^mkfontscale@1.1.2%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^gperf
                        ^libxml2@2.9.9%gcc@5.4.0~python arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^libiconv@1.15%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^glib@2.56.3%gcc@5.4.0~libmount tracing=none arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^gettext@0.19.8.1%gcc@5.4.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^tar
                        ^libffi@3.2.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^pcre@8.42%gcc@5.4.0~jit+multibyte+utf arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^python@2.7.16%gcc@5.4.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter+ucs4~uuid+zlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^expat
                            ^openssl@1.1.1b%gcc@5.4.0+systemcerts arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^sqlite@3.0.8:
                    ^pixman@0.38.0%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^curl@7.63.0%gcc@5.4.0~darwinssl~gssapi~libssh~libssh2~nghttp2 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^icu4c@60.1%gcc@5.4.0 cxxstd=11 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^libjpeg-turbo@2.0.2%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^cmake@3.15.1%gcc@5.4.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^nasm
                ^libtiff@4.0.10%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^openjdk@11.0.2%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^pango@1.41.0%gcc@5.4.0~X arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^gobject-introspection@1.56.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^bison@3.0.5%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^help2man@1.47.8%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^flex@2.6.4%gcc@5.4.0+lex arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^harfbuzz@2.3.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^tcl@8.6.8%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^r-lattice@0.20-35%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64

r-edger requires r version 3.5.0:3.5.9, but spec asked for 3.6.0

```
**According to the error message, I also loaded R3.6.0,command is as follows but the error content is the same.What else I can do to solve this problem?**
```

$ spack install r %gcc@5.4.0
$ spack install trinity %gcc@5.4.0 ^r@3.6.0

```
